verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber also spake יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, God אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' unto Joshua לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

דַּבֵּ֛ר <WH1696> dab-Ber Speak אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei to the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying תְּנ֤וּ <WH5414> te-Nu Appoint out לָכֶם֙ la-Chem אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> 'a-Rei for you cities הַמִּקְלָ֔ט <WH4733> ham-mik-Lat, of refuge אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- of which דִּבַּ֥רְתִּי <WH1696> dib-Bar-ti whereof I spake אֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Chem to you בְּיַד־ <WH3027> be-yad- unto you by the hand מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> mo-Sheh. of Moses

לָנ֥וּס <WH5127> la-Nus may flee שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <WH8033> Sham-mah there רוֹצֵ֔חַ <WH7523> ro-Tze-ach, That the slayer מַכֵּה־ <WH5221> mak-keh- that killeth נֶ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> Ne-fesh [any] person בִּשְׁגָגָ֖ה <WH7684> bish-ga-Gah unawares בִּבְלִי־ <WH1097> biv-li- without דָ֑עַת <WH1847> Da-'at; [and] unwittingly וְהָי֤וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu shall become לָכֶם֙ la-Chem לְמִקְלָ֔ט <WH4733> le-mik-Lat, thither and they shall be your refuge מִגֹּאֵ֖ל <WH1350> mig-go-'El from the avenger הַדָּֽם׃ <WH1818> had-Dam. of blood

וְנָ֞ס <WH5127> ve-Nas And when he that doth flee אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אַחַ֣ת׀ <WH259> 'a-Chat unto one מֵהֶעָרִ֣ים <WH5892> me-he-'a-Rim of those cities הָאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh, of these וְעָמַד֙ <WH5975> ve-'a-Mad shall stand פֶּ֚תַח <WH6607> Pe-tach at the entering שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> Sha-'ar of the gate הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir, of the city וְדִבֶּ֛ר <WH1696> ve-dib-Ber and shall declare בְּאָזְנֵ֛י <WH241> be-'a-ze-Nei in the ears זִקְנֵ֥י־ <WH2205> zik-Nei of the elders הָעִֽיר <WH5892> ha-'ir- of that city הַהִ֖יא <WH1931> ha-Hi he אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דְּבָרָ֑יו <WH1697> de-va-Rav; his cause וְאָסְפ֨וּ <WH622> ve-'a-se-Fu they shall take אֹת֤וֹ <WH853> o-To הָעִ֙ירָה֙ <WH5892> ha-'I-rah him into the city אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem, to וְנָתְנוּ־ <WH5414> ve-na-te-nu- unto them and give ל֥וֹ lo מָק֖וֹם <WH4725> ma-Kom him a place וְיָשַׁ֥ב <WH3427> ve-ya-Shav that he may dwell עִמָּֽם׃ <WH5973> 'im-Mam. among

וְכִ֨י <WH3588> ve-Chi now if יִרְדֹּ֜ף <WH7291> yir-Dof pursue גֹּאֵ֤ל <WH1350> go-'El And if the avenger הַדָּם֙ <WH1818> had-Dam of blood אַֽחֲרָ֔יו <WH310> 'a-cha-Rav, after וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- shall not יַסְגִּ֥רוּ <WH5462> yas-Gi-ru him then they shall not deliver אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָרֹצֵ֖חַ <WH7523> ha-ro-Tze-ach the slayer בְּיָד֑וֹ <WH3027> be-ya-Do; up into his hand כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki because בִבְלִי־ <WH1097> viv-li- without דַ֙עַת֙ <WH1847> da-'at premeditation הִכָּ֣ה <WH5221> hik-Kah because he smote אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- רֵעֵ֔הוּ <WH7453> re-'E-hu, his neighbour וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- and did not שֹׂנֵ֥א <WH8130> so-Ne and hated ה֛וּא <WH1931> hu he ל֖וֹ lo מִתְּמ֥וֹל <WH8543> mit-te-Mol before שִׁלְשֽׁוֹם׃ <WH8032> shil-Shom. before that time

וְיָשַׁ֣ב׀ <WH3427> ve-ya-Shav And he shall dwell בָּעִ֣יר <WH5892> ba-'Ir in that city הַהִ֗יא <WH1931> ha-Hi, he עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until עָמְד֞וֹ <WH5975> a-me-Do until he stand לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> lif-Nei before הָֽעֵדָה֙ <WH5712> ha-'e-Dah the congregation לַמִּשְׁפָּ֔ט <WH4941> lam-mish-Pat, for judgment עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until מוֹת֙ <WH4194> mOt [and] until the death הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen priest הַגָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> hag-ga-Dol, of the high אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher that יִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become בַּיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> bai-ya-Mim shall be in those days הָהֵ֑ם <WH1992> ha-Hem; those אָ֣ז׀ <WH227> 'az Then יָשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> ya-Shuv return הָרוֹצֵ֗חַ <WH7523> ha-ro-Tze-ach, then shall the slayer וּבָ֤א <WH935> u-Va and come אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to his עִירוֹ֙ <WH5892> i-Ro unto his own city וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and to בֵּית֔וֹ <WH1004> bei-To, and unto his own house אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir unto the city אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which נָ֥ס <WH5127> nas from whence he fled מִשָּֽׁם׃ <WH8033> mish-Sham. they

וַיַּקְדִּ֜שׁוּ <WH6942> vai-yak-Di-shu And they appointed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- קֶ֤דֶשׁ <WH6943> Ke-desh Kedesh בַּגָּלִיל֙ <WH1551> bag-ga-Lil in Galilee בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> be-Har in mount נַפְתָּלִ֔י <WH5321> naf-ta-Li, Naphtali וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et שְׁכֶ֖ם <WH7927> she-Chem and Shechem בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> be-Har in mount אֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim; Ephraim וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et קִרְיַ֥ת kir-Yat אַרְבַּ֛ע <WH7153> 'ar-Ba' and Kirjatharba הִ֥יא <WH1931> hi he חֶבְר֖וֹן <WH2275> chev-Ron which [is] Hebron בְּהַ֥ר <WH2022> be-Har in the mountain יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah. of Judah

וּמֵעֵ֜בֶר <WH5676> u-me-'E-ver And on the other side לְיַרְדֵּ֤ן <WH3383> le-yar-Den Jordan יְרִיחוֹ֙ <WH3405> ye-ri-Cho by Jericho מִזְרָ֔חָה <WH4217> miz-Ra-chah, eastward נָתְנ֞וּ <WH5414> na-te-Nu they assigned אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בֶּ֧צֶר <WH1221> Be-tzer Bezer בַּמִּדְבָּ֛ר <WH4057> bam-mid-Bar in the wilderness בַּמִּישֹׁ֖ר <WH4334> bam-mi-Shor upon the plain מִמַּטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> mi-mat-Teh out of the tribe רְאוּבֵ֑ן <WH7205> re-'u-Ven; of Reuben וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et רָאמֹ֤ת <WH7216> ra-Mot and Ramoth בַּגִּלְעָד֙ <WH1568> bag-gil-'Ad in Gilead מִמַּטֵּה־ <WH4294> mi-mat-teh- out of the tribe גָ֔ד <WH1410> Gad, of Gad וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et ; גָּלֹון ga-lon כגֹּולָ֥ן <WH1474> go-Lan Golan קבַּבָּשָׁ֖ן <WH1316> bab-ba-Shan in Bashan מִמַּטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> mi-mat-Teh out of the tribe מְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh. of Manasseh

אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These הָיוּ֩ <WH1961> ha-Yu become עָרֵ֨י <WH5892> 'a-Rei These were the cities הַמּֽוּעָדָ֜ה <WH4152> ham-mu-'a-Dah appointed לְכֹ֣ל׀ <WH3605> le-Chol for all בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei for all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וְלַגֵּר֙ <WH1616> ve-lag-Ger and for the stranger הַגָּ֣ר <WH1481> hag-Gar that sojourneth בְּתוֹכָ֔ם <WH8432> be-to-Cham, among לָנ֣וּס <WH5127> la-Nus might flee שָׁ֔מָּה <WH8033> Sham-mah, there כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- whoever מַכֵּה־ <WH5221> mak-keh- them that whosoever killeth נֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> Ne-fesh [any] person בִּשְׁגָגָ֑ה <WH7684> bish-ga-Gah; at unawares וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo and not יָמ֗וּת <WH4191> ya-Mut, thither and not die בְּיַד֙ <WH3027> be-Yad by the hand גֹּאֵ֣ל <WH1350> go-'El of the avenger הַדָּ֔ם <WH1818> had-Dam, of blood עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until עָמְד֖וֹ <WH5975> a-me-Do until he stood לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lif-Nei before הָעֵדָֽה׃ <WH5712> ha-'e-Dah. the congregation פ Peh
